general_advisory: Prepare the wet nursery seed beds for paddy. Using rainwater, the nursery beds may puddle 2-3 times followed by planking. Apply 200 kg of FYM, 4 kg of DAP, 2.5 kg of MOP, and 1 kg of Zinc sulphate during last puddling. Divide nursery area into smaller plots of a convenient length. Irrigation channels of size 30 cm in width should be made along the beds for irrigation/drainage purpose. Sprouted Seeds should be sown @ 40-50 g/m2 area of seed bed by line sowing with 5 cm gap between each line. Treat the paddy seeds with Carbendazim 50% W.P @ 1.5 g/1kg of seeds or Carboxin 37.5% + Thiram 37.5% @ 3 g/1 kg of seeds before sowing in the nursery.
